title: 628 - Christmas Vacation | Tale of the Tape
description:
It will be a long winding journey down that holiday memory road with Clark and his family. (story part starts about 17:25)

Also check out “The Big Loop” by Paul Bae at https://www.thebiglooppodcast.com/ or wherever you listen to you podcasts.

You can find all of our sponsors or become a patron on our new website www.sleepwithmepodcast.com
